html:
** Mega-cap tech firms fall in premarket trading, tracking global markets, as investors were rattled by warnings that Russia could invade Ukraine at any time .N

** Meta Platforms Inc FB.O, Apple Inc AAPL.O, Microsoft Corp MSFT.O, Alphabet Inc GOOGL.O, Amazon.com Inc AMZN.O and Tesla Inc TSLA.O shed between 1.1% and 2.3% premarket

** U.S. stock index futures post broad-based declines of nearly 1%

** FB, MSFT shares fell for two straight weeks; AAPL, GOOGL, TSLA, AMZN were down between 2% and 7% last week

** For the year, mega-cap tech stocks have declined between 5% and 35%


(Reporting by Nivedita Balu in Bengaluru)

(( Nivedita.Balu@thomsonreuters.com ; Twitter: https://twitter.com/niveditabalu; ))
